column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////We went on a Sunday about 1 pm.  Wait was about 45 minutes but we expected this.  The service (thanks Renzo)
column3: and food were excellent.  We had cappuccinos
column6: and chocolate chip pancakes. Only complaint was the knives
column7: you will see what I mean when you are there.  Highly recommend.  Worth the wait.
